text: Ole Danbolt Mjøs (8 March 1939 – 1 October 2013)Jan Arild Holbek and Trygve W. Jordheim (1 October 2013): Ole Danbolt Mjøs er død Vårt Land. Retrieved 1 October 2013 was a Norwegian physician and politician for the Christian Democratic Party. He was a professor and former rector at the University of Tromsø, and he was the leader of the Norwegian Nobel Committee from 2003 to 2008. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Norwegian physicians Category:Norwegian politicians Category:Norwegian Nobel Committee
title: Ole Danbolt Mjøs
